snippet: Adblock Plus, an “add-on” for the Firefox Web browser, will now display an “acceptable ad” by default, unless the user acts.
abstract: Noam Cohen Link by Link column notes Adblock Plus, add-on for Firefox Web browser, will now display an 'acceptable ad' by default, unless the user acts to opt out and block all ads as before.
lead_paragraph: Adblock Plus, an “add-on” for the Firefox Web browser, will now display an “acceptable ad” by default, unless the user acts.

headline.seo: An Ad Blocker Opens the Gate, Ever So Slightly
headline.main: An Ad Blocker Opens the Gate, Ever So Slightly
headline.print_headline: An Ad Blocker Opens the Gate, Ever So Slightly
